Your pharmacy recruitment consultancy of choice

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”30″][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”28″][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”28″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”center” id=”About” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column centered_text=”true” column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-left”][vc_column_text]

About us

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][vc_column_text max_width=”850″]

We are an independent specialist pharmacy recruitment consultancy. We support pharmacies throughout the UK with their recruitment needs and candidates in finding their ideal next career move.

Our goal is not to be the biggest but the best pharmacy recruitment consultancy, with a reputation for adding value and delivering outstanding service to our candidates and clients.

At Prime Pharmacy, we pride ourselves on our reputation, performance and approachability. With over twenty years of recruitment experience and specialist knowledge of the Pharmacy recruitment market, we are in a prime position to help our candidates and clients.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”25″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” bg_image=”6826″ bg_position=”center center” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” bg_color=”#f9f9f9″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”10%” bottom_padding=”10%” color_overlay=”#232323″ overlay_strength=”0.5″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” parallax_bg=”true” parallax_bg_speed=”slow” shape_type=””][vc_column centered_text=”true” column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ font_color=”#ffffff” column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp” max_width=”1100″]

Prime Pharmacy have delivered on the Pharmacist brief, in a quick time frame and with a professional manner. We would have no hesitation in recommending them. Thank you

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” bg_color=”#f9f9f9″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”10%” bottom_padding=”10%” id=”Roles” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”10″][image_with_animation image_url=”6835″ alignment=”” animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”left” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom”][vc_column_text]

Typical Roles we recruit for UK Wide:

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”40″][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]
  • Pharmacist
  • Relief Pharmacist
  • Pre-Reg Pharmacist
  • Locum Pharmacist
  • Pharmacist Manager
  • Pharmacy Supervisor
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]
  • Pharmacy Technician
  • Pharmacy Dispenser
  • Pharmacy Assistant
  • Trainee Pharmacy Assistant
  • Accuracy Checking Technician
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” class=”vc_hidden-xs vc_hidden-sm” id=”Promise” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-left”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”55″][vc_column_text]

The Prime Pharmacy
candidate promise

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][vc_column_text]
  • We will provide professional, confidential advice and guidance on your pharmacy career path and choices.
  • We will take time to listen to you and understand your motivations and personal situation and will always represent you in a fair and professional manner.
  • We understand that job searching and changing jobs for many people can be a daunting experience. We promise to take that burden away from you, guiding you every step of the way, leaving you safe in the knowledge that we understand your market and we know the companies that will match your career aspirations.
  • We can assist you with a range of added-value services including our career consultation which includes career coaching, salary benchmarking, interview advice and market insight.
[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Extra-Color-2″ icon_family=”none” url=”/register-with-us/” text=”Register with us” margin_top=”10″ margin_right=”10″ margin_bottom=”10″ css_animation=”fadeInUp” margin_left=”25″][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”55″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”6838″ enable_bg_scale=”true” column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” el_class=”vc_hidden-xs vc_hidden-sm” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” class=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-lg” id=”Promise” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”left-right” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-left”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”55″][vc_column_text]

The Prime Pharmacy
candidate promise

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][vc_column_text]
  • We will provide professional, confidential advice and guidance on your pharmacy career path and choices. 
  • We will take time to listen to you and understand your motivations and personal situation and will always represent you in a fair and professional manner. 
  • We understand that job searching and changing jobs for many people can be a daunting experience. We promise to take that burden away from you, guiding you every step of the way, leaving you safe in the knowledge that we understand your market and we know the companies that will match your career aspirations.
  • We can assist you with a range of added-value services including our career consultation which includes career coaching, salary benchmarking, interview advice and market insight.
[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Extra-Color-2″ icon_family=”none” url=”/register-with-us/” text=”Register with us” margin_top=”10″ margin_right=”10″ margin_bottom=”10″ css_animation=”fadeInUp” margin_left=”25″][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”55″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”5808″ enable_bg_scale=”true” column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” el_class=”vc_hidden-xs vc_hidden-sm” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” bg_color=”#89c03d” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” id=”Testimonials” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” top_margin=”30″ bottom_margin=”30″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom”][carousel script=”flickity” flickity_formatting=”fixed_text_content_fullwidth” flickity_fixed_content=”

The Prime Pharmacy client promise

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” top_padding=”40″ bottom_padding=”35″ text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”none”][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default” animate=”yes” custom_height=”1″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom”][nectar_icon icon_family=”iconsmind” icon_style=”default” icon_color=”Accent-Color” icon_padding=”0px” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Speach-BubbleDialog” icon_size=”36″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523270152863{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Getting to know you and your practice

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571064130325{padding-right: 10% !important;}”]We know to be successful for you we need to listen to you. We always take the time to lift the lid on your business to get to grips with your Company values and culture.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom” delay=”100″][nectar_icon icon_family=”iconsmind” icon_style=”default” icon_color=”Accent-Color” icon_padding=”0px” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Handshake” icon_size=”36″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523270181213{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Partnership

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571064147787{padding-right: 10% !important;}”]We build long-lasting partnerships based on recruitment success, a success that is centred on understanding and fulfilling your exact vacancy requirements, saving you time and money whilst working to your time frames.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom”][nectar_icon icon_family=”iconsmind” icon_style=”default” icon_color=”Accent-Color” icon_padding=”0px” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Numbering-List” icon_size=”36″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523270521358{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Our approach

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523270446073{padding-right: 10% !important;}”]We go out to market both through an extensive advertising network covering all possible sources and direct to our databases, spreading the vacancy instantly to relevant candidates and their referral network. In the vast majority of cases our candidates a fairly passive in finding a new role until we match them to the ideal opportunity. We are specialists in candidate attraction strategies operating as a consultancy not simply an agency. That’s just our style. All our candidates are thoroughly interviewed and fully briefed on the roles for which they are being put forward for.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom” delay=”100″][nectar_icon icon_family=”iconsmind” icon_style=”default” icon_color=”Accent-Color” icon_padding=”0px” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Business-ManWoman” icon_size=”36″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523270526599{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Technology

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523270480115{padding-right: 10% !important;}”]

We have state of the art software and in-depth market intelligence, which means that we can reach out to talented candidates quickly. All compliance documentation that we gather from our candidates are held securely in our software under strict data protection rules which is backed up daily.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” bg_color=”#f9f9f9″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”8%” bottom_padding=”5%” class=”vc_hidden-xs vc_hidden-sm” id=”Blog” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]

Blogs

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”70″][nectar_blog layout=”masonry-blog-fullwidth” blog_masonry_style=”material” category=”all” load_in_animation=”none” order=”DESC” orderby=”date” posts_per_page=”3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” bg_color=”#f9f9f9″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”8%” bottom_padding=”5%” class=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-lg” id=”Blog” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”40″][vc_column_text]

Blogs

Are you looking for Pharmacy Talent for your Business?
